attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already have our own parliament so why dont we use it. We should get our own prime minister and own royal family and own army. Cut ties with th rest of britain and make our own decisions about going to war and which countries we are allies with as well as our laws all being our own from everythng such from recycling to criminal sentences.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
